value.title: Spawn Delay
value.comment: Amount of delay before the leaf spawns. Can be set up to 4095.

value.title: Respawn Related
value.comment: Use values 0-3. See 'Spawn state' for more info.

list.title: Start Color
list.comment: value 0 makes the leaf bouncy. It only works with 'Size' set to Medium or Large.

list.title: Direction
list.comment: Controls the dirrection of the leaf

list.title: Spawn State
list.comment: *Value 2 only works if there are at least 4 leaves with this value present. Those 4 leaves will have to take up values 0-3 from 'Respawn Related'.

value.title: Sprout Delay
value.comment: Amount delay between the bud appearing and the leaf growing

value.title: Duration until fall off
value.comment: Amount of delay before the leaf falls off

value.title: Beanstalk ID
value.comment: Link this up with the Beanstalk's ID when there is more than one Beanstalk in an area. With only one, you can just set it to 0.

sprite.name: Bob-omb
sprite.notes: A bomb like creature that will explode after Mario jumps on its head or shoots a fireball at it. It will instantly explode when crushed or touches lava.

list.title: Type
list.comment: Changes the sprite's initial behavior. Actually, there is a difference between 2 and 6, regarding the internal bob-omb counter. Value 2 does not increment the internal bob-omb counter. This matters for example, when a cannon is placed nearby this bob-omb. The cannon only fires bob-ombs when this counter is less than 8.

value.title: Bomb ID (Bowser Jr W7) [Useless]
value.comment: This nybble is useless, because the bowser jr type crashes the game. When nybble 5 ("Type") is set to 5 (Bowser Jr throws multiple bob-ombs at once), all bob-ombs have an ascending id. This is probably used to change the direction the bob-omb he throws flies, so they don't all go into the same direction.

list.title: Cannon direction
list.comment: The direction the bob-omb is fired by the cannon, when type is 3.

list.title: Pipe direction
list.comment: This is used as the pipe direction when type is 1.

sprite.name: Rotation-controlled Dash Coin
sprite.notes: A Coin Outline that can be rotation-controlled.

value.title: Movement ID
value.comment: The movement id for the sprite.

value.title: Type
value.comment: Valid values are 0 to 10. Values 11 and 12 will crash the game.
